citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11 am on
18-MAR-20.
No one home at facility, so called contact phone number. Spoke with Mr. Weaver, who won't be home until late
afternoon. Left my contact information.
